official_title: A resolution authorizing the administration of the oath of office to the Honorable Edith Green at Portland, Oregon.

summary.text: Authorizes the Speaker, or deputy named by him, to administer the oath of office to the Honorable Edith Green at Portland, Oregon, and that the said oath be accepted and received by the House as the oath of office of the said Edith Green.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the administration of the oath of office to the Honorable Edith Green at Portland, Oregon.
